amendment.description: Amendment requires that any detained foreign terrorist be tried in a military tribunal rather than in an Article III court.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-485 to direct the Department of Defense to hold detainee trials in the US Facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, and not in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rooney amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 171 (Roll no. 266).
